full_summary:
# Title: EMC Software Maintenance and Support for Shared Services Canada (SSC)

Summary:
Shared Services Canada (SSC) invites bids for the provision of EMC Software Maintenance and Support for SSC - DND or equivalent. This solicitation contains a security requirement.

### Solicitation Details
| Field     | Value                                     |
|------------|---------------------------------------------|
| Refer ids  | SSC-24-00025701:T                            |
| Solicitation | BPM020908/25701                                |
| Solicitation Date| February 23, 2024                           |
| Closing date | March 5, 2024, at 2:00 PM EST                |
| Status        | Expired dục                                |
| Trade agreements | Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), and others |

### Description of Requirement:
SSC requires the provision of EMC Software Maintenance and Support for SSC - DND or equivalent. The service includes but is not limited to installation management, hardware maintenance and intervention, degradation recovery, and incident management.

### Important Dates:
- February 23, 2024: solicitation open
- March 5, 2024 at 2:00 PM EST: submission deadline

### Additional Information:
- Suppliers may submit emails to: `tenders-offres@ssc-spc.gc.ca`
- Link to P2P Portal to Access BPM solicitation :https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/rfp/request_browse_all Under Solicitation List : BPM020908

### Closing:
SSC will not accept submissions of proposals after the above-mentioned deadline. End of Notice DSM430_AMP._Attachments are available at the link below/httpattachmentLinks for this solicitation can be accessed at :https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/rfp/request_browse_public Under Solicitation List : BPM020908

Acceding the links above will lead you to other documents relevant to this announcement which you must also read for completeness. 

For any questions or concerns, please reach out to Eric Lavigne via Phone or e-mail.

 THIS NOTICE IS POSTED SO THAT THIS SOLICITATION WILL STILL HAVE A PUBLIC RECORD OF PUBLICATION, EVEN THOUGH THE TENDER IS EXPIRED. Full list and access information for the solicitation is available in Shared Services Canada P2P portal at [link above]
